title: Falam (1993) Genesis Portion (Chin)
description: Chin Falam translation of the Gospel of John. Falam, is a Kuki-Chin language in Falam township, Chin State, Burma, and also in India. Falam Chin is closely related to most Central Chin languages, especially Hakha Chin which has been studied more in depth than Falam Chin.

language.name: Falam Chin
language.area: Falam District, Chin Hills. Also in Bangladesh, India.
